footer.description: Montreal's #1 signage company with over 3 decades of experience. We transform businesses through innovative design and quality craftsmanship.

hero.title: 3 decades of experience
hero.description: Enseignes MEDIAPRINT has 30 years of expertise in the design, manufacturing, installation, and repair of signs and graphic displays. This expertise, combined with creativity and a commitment to staying at the forefront of technology, makes MEDIAPRINT a reference in the field.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Our mission is very clear: to provide optimized and fully tested products and solutions to our clients. At Enseignes MEDIAPRINT, we aim for nothing less than excellence, both in our customer relationships and in our products and services.

values.title: Excellence
values.description: We aim for nothing less than excellence in our customer relationships and in our products and services.

values.title: Innovation
values.description: Always at the forefront of technology, we continuously research the latest innovations in our field.

values.title: Passion
values.description: We are passionate about our craft and always seek the best ways to highlight your message.

values.title: Partnership
values.description: We build lasting relationships with our clients, understanding their unique needs and objectives.

passion.title: Driven by innovation & excellence
passion.description: Our passion for innovation and excellence drives us to constantly push the boundaries of what's possible in the signage industry. We are proud of our ability to transform our clients' visions into tangible realities that captivate and inspire.

timeline.title: Our Journey
timeline.description: Discover the key moments that have shaped our company and allowed us to become a leader in the signage industry.

achievements.title: Company Foundation
achievements.description: Enseignes MEDIAPRINT was founded with the goal of revolutionizing the signage industry in Montreal.

achievements.title: Service Expansion
achievements.description: Large format printing and LED digital display technology

achievements.title: Established Leadership
achievements.description: Consolidation of our leadership position with over 1500 projects completed and a team of dedicated experts.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.description: Don't just take our word for it. Here's what our satisfied clients have to say about our signage solutions and service quality.

items.name: Sarah Johnson
items.content: The team at Signs & Graphics transformed our storefront completely. Our new LED sign increased foot traffic by 40% in just two months. Exceptional quality and service!

items.name: Michael Chen
items.content: From concept to installation, everything was handled professionally. Our new office signage perfectly reflects our brand identity. Highly recommend their design expertise.

items.name: Lisa Rodriguez
items.content: After 3 years, our signs still look brand new. The quality of materials and craftsmanship is outstanding. Their maintenance service keeps everything perfect.

items.name: David Thompson
items.content: Quick turnaround time and competitive pricing. They understood our vision immediately and delivered exactly what we wanted. Our property signs are now the best in town.

items.name: Amanda Foster
items.content: Professional installation with minimal disruption to our operations. The directional signage has improved patient flow significantly. Great attention to detail.

items.name: Robert Kim
items.content: The illuminated menu board increased our evening sales dramatically. Customer service was excellent throughout the entire process. Worth every penny invested.
